subject: [R] codamenu() :Error in coda.options....
body:
Dear all, 

I recently started having some problemd with the coda package. I have also deleted it and then installed the package again. 

The problem is that I cant access the codamenu. That is ;

*********************************************************************************************************************************************
> library(coda)
> codamenu()
Error in coda.options(default = TRUE) : cannot change value of locked binding for '.Coda.Options'

Quitting codamenu ...
Error in !coda.options("data.saved") : invalid argument type
> 

*********************************************************************************************************************************************

Thank you,

Regards,

Luwis Diya


	[[alternative HTML version deleted]]

and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
